articles.author: By Elise Hammond, Chandelis Duster, Kathleen Magramo, Elizabeth Wolfe, Aya Elamroussi and Lauren Mascarenhas, CNN
articles.title: College protests over Gaza sweep across America. Hundreds arrested - CNN
articles.description: Pro-Palestinian protests are taking place at major US universities, prompting some officials to take extraordinary steps to confront the growing crisis. Follow for live news updates.
articles.content:
A "demonstration with encampments" has formed at the University of California, Los Angeles, (UCLA) in Royce Quad, the university said in a campus activity update Thursday. 
Access to Royce Hall and … [+911 chars]
